title: Snowdonia
creator_credit: Idloes Owen, Horace Shepherd, British Council and Inspiration Pictures (GB)
brief_description: Some of the loveliest scenery in Wales; the view from the summit of Snowden, historic Conway Castel, the Swallow Falls. Shots of Caeruaroon Castle include the Kings Gate, the ruined Banqueting Hall and the Eagle Tower where the Welsh flag and the Union Jack fly side by side.
creator_credit_for_label: Idloes Owen, Horace Shepherd, British Council and Inspiration Pictures (GB)
